translation.en: [narrator] Hollywood, California. Tinseltown is boomtown.
translation.ko: 캘리포니아 할리우드 "할리우드랜드" 뜨겁게 성장 중인 반짝이는 도시죠

translation.en: During the war, Los Angeles grew as a hub of wartime industry,
translation.ko: 전쟁 당시 로스앤젤레스는 군수 산업 중심지로 성장하여

translation.en: producing all manner of aircraft and ammunition
to support our fighting men overseas.
translation.ko: 이국에서 전투 중인 우리 병사들을 지원했습니다

translation.en: The war now over,
many of these starry-eyed dreamers hope to make it in moving pictures,
translation.ko: 영화계에 발 들이려는 이들이 초롱초롱한 눈빛을 하고

translation.en: swarming like so many locusts outside the studio gates,
translation.ko: 메뚜기 떼처럼 스튜디오 앞에 모여들고 있습니다

translation.en: hoping to score a role as an extra
and become the next Paul Muni or Hedy Lamarr.
translation.ko: 차세대 폴 무니 또는 헤디 라마가 되는 것이죠

translation.en: The studio system is king,
and if you make all the right moves, you too could be living in Beverly Hills,
translation.ko: 필요한 단계만 밟아 나간다면 당신도 베벌리힐스에서 살며

translation.en: splashing in your private pool with invitations to all the right parties.
translation.ko: 개인 수영장에서 물장구도 치고 온갖 파티에 초대받게 될 겁니다

translation.en: You might even become immortalized at Grauman's Chinese Theatre.
translation.ko: 그로먼스 차이니즈 시어터에 자신의 이름을 남길 수도 있겠죠

translation.en: The rewards for ambition are bountiful here
translation.ko: 야심가들을 위한 보상이 풍족하게 준비된 이곳

translation.en: in the beautiful Southern California sun.
translation.ko: 햇볕이 내리쬐는 아름다운 곳 남부 캘리포니아입니다

translation.en: [man] Pardon me. Beg your pardon.
Sorry, excuse me.
Excuse me, pardon me.
Excuse me, coming through. Sorry.
-Hiya, Lou! -Hey, Jackie. Get over here, kid.
-Say, what time'd you get here? -About an hour ago,
-early birds getting worms and such. -Sure.
They're still lensing the John Farrow picture with Alan Ladd and Donna Reed.
translation.ko: 앨런 래드와 도나 리드 주연의 존 패로 영화를 렌징 중이래

translation.en: -"Lensing"? -Lensing.
It's how you say "filmmaking" in Hollywood-ese. You gotta learn the lingo.
translation.ko: 할리우드에선 촬영을 그렇게 불러 전문용어 좀 배워놔

translation.en: Billy Wilder is helming a picture with Emperor Franz--
translation.ko: 프란츠 요제프 황제 영화는 빌리 와일더가 지휘하는데...

translation.en: -"Helming"? -Directing.
Bing Crosby, Joan Fontaine, it's gonna be boffo BO.
translation.ko: 빙 크로스비, 존 폰테인 주연이라 박스오피스 흥행감이야

translation.en: And she thinks we're gonna start the day on the big ballroom scene.
translation.ko: 그분 말로는 첫 촬영이 무도회 장면이라는데

translation.en: Lots of extras. People standing by the punch bowl,
translation.ko: 엑스트라도 많을 거야 술통 앞에도 사람이 필요하고

translation.en: folks crossing the hallway when they enter the big door.
translation.ko: 배우들 입장할 때 복도 지나갈 사람도 필요하거든

translation.en: I think I got a real shot at that one.
translation.ko: 그 역할은 내가 딸 것 같아

translation.en: What about a western or war picture? Something like that.
They making any of those?
You don't say "making a movie," Jack. You produce a movie, "produce."
translation.ko: 영화는 만드는 게 아니야, 잭 제작하는 거지

translation.en: You gotta know this stuff if you wanna make it big time.
translation.ko: 정말 뜨고 싶다면 이런 건 알아놓는 게 좋아

translation.en: Shh, shh, shh! Here she comes, the old gorgon herself.
Okay, listen up. I'm only gonna say this once.
translation.ko: 자, 다들 주목 딱 한 번만 말할게요

translation.en: Rule number one, do not look at the camera.
translation.ko: 첫 번째 규칙 카메라 쳐다보지 않습니다

translation.en: Rule number two, do not talk to the director.
translation.ko: 두 번째 규칙 감독님께 말하지 않습니다

translation.en: In fact, a good rule of thumb is to not talk at all.
translation.ko: 아예 입을 열지 않는 게 여러분께 좋을 겁니다

translation.en: Rule number three, if you see a platter of food on the sound stage, do not eat it.
translation.ko: 세 번째 규칙, 촬영장 음식은 절대로 먹지 않습니다

translation.en: That is not for you. That is for the actors and the crew.
translation.ko: 여러분이 아니라 배우와 촬영진을 위한 거예요

translation.en: If you see food on the set, do not eat that. That is a prop.
translation.ko: 세트장 음식도 먹지 않습니다 그건 소품이니까요

translation.en: Now we have that out of the way.
Today, we're lensing a scene from a war pic.
translation.ko: 오늘은 전쟁 영화 장면을 렌징할 건데...

translation.en: -Lensing. -[woman] Seven were saved
where the plane goes down,
and a bunch of passengers flail around in the water and then die, okay?
translation.ko: 허우적거리다가 익사할 승객이 여러 명 필요한 상황이에요

translation.en: -[crowd clamoring] -All right, uh, you,
-and you... -[man] Thanks!
You, you and you...
you...
uh, you...
and...
-you. -[cymbal crashes]
[woman] Okay, thank you very much. That's it for today. See y'all tomorrow.
translation.ko: 다들 수고했어요 오늘은 끝났으니까 내일 보죠

translation.en: Excuse me, Ms. Roswell. Beg your pardon, Jack Castello.
translation.ko: 잠깐만요, 로즈웰 씨 실례합니다, 잭 카스텔로예요

translation.en: I think I'd be great in your war picture.
translation.ko: 제가 전쟁 영화에 딱일 것 같아요

translation.en: The drowning scene? You see, I fought at Anzio.
translation.ko: 익사 장면 있다고 했죠? 안치오 전투에 참전했거든요

translation.en: -Oh, you have training? -Sure, Fort Benning, Georgia.
Mm, I mean acting training.
-You got any of that? -Well, no.
Good-looking kid like you, you think you just gotta show up and poof,
translation.ko: 얼굴만 곱상하게 생겼으면 불쑥 나타나기만 해도

translation.en: you're a movie star, huh? Well, that ain't how it works.
translation.ko: 스타가 될 줄 알았나 보죠? 여긴 그렇게 안 굴러가요

translation.en: Pretty face, but no training.
[chuckles] Kid, you're a dime a dozen.
[man] Look, first breaks are tough in this town.
translation.ko: 이 동네에선 원래 첫 일 따내는 게 힘들어

translation.en: Don't beat yourself up.
No, no, no, no.
Already taken care of.
-What does he want? -Don't know. Maybe he thought you looked thirsty.
[clerk] Now, you're looking for a loan of about $20,000?
[woman] Yes, that's right. Just enough for a modest home.
translation.ko: 네, 적당한 집만 구할 수 있으면 돼요

translation.en: [clerk] Swell, let's take a look at your application.
I see you're a veteran, Mr. Castello. Thank you for your service.
translation.ko: 카스텔로 씨는 참전 용사시군요 헌신에 감사드립니다

translation.en: And Mrs. Castello, you are a waitress.
Yes, and I intend to keep working until the baby arrives.
translation.ko: 네, 출산할 때까진 계속 일할 생각이에요

translation.en: [clerk] So, you're expecting?
Well, congratulations.
And Mr. Castello,
it says here you're a film actor. Any pictures I might know you from?
translation.ko: 영화배우라고 되어 있는데 제가 아는 영화가 있을까요?

translation.en: Ah, probably not.
Uh, to me, it's not about the notoriety, it's about the craft.
translation.ko: 제겐 유명세가 아니라 그 일 자체가 중요하거든요

translation.en: It's about showing up to work every day, you know.
-And for a super, that can mean-- -I'm sorry, a what?
Oh, a supernumerary. A supernumerary.
-It means "extra." -It means "background actor."
That's the proper term.
In many ways, we contribute to the reality of the scene
translation.ko: 여러 면에서 장면의 현실감을 살려주는 역할이에요

translation.en: even more so than the principal actors.
But I don't see any income here.
Uh, no, presently not, but, uh...
But hey! I've got a casting tomorrow,
and if they pick me, that's ten dollars in my pocket!
Very well. Uh...
Unfortunately, Mr. and Mrs. Castello,
we would be unable to provide a loan of the size that you're seeking
based on your current income.
Listen, thank you for your time, sir.
One of those days, huh?
Bartender, two more, please.
-Why are you buying me drinks? -To thank you for your service.
translation.ko: - 왜 술 사주는 거예요? - 고마워서 그러지

translation.en: You served, didn't you? Where'd you fight?
-Anzio. -Anzio! [chuckles]
Anzio was rough.
Ernie.
-Jack. -Nice to meet you.
I wanted to fight. Tried to enlist and everything, but they wouldn't take me.
-Said my cock was too big. -[coughing]
Yeah, surprised me too. I mean, it's big.
translation.ko: 그래, 나도 놀랐어 솔직히 크긴 크거든

translation.en: Twelve inches, soup to nuts, and not floppy either.
I get hard as a fucking rock.
Are you for real? What are you talking about?
-I got a very big dick. -[Jack] No, I...
I heard you when you said that. I'm wondering why. Why are you...
translation.ko: 무슨 말인진 알겠는데 왜 나한테 하냐고요

translation.en: coming up to a stranger in a bar, talking about how big your cock is?
translation.ko: 왜 낯선 사람한테 와서 물건 자랑을 하시는 거예요?

translation.en: -Because you asked me. -Did I? Does not sound like me.
translation.ko: - 자네가 물었잖아 - 그런 질문 할 리가 없는데

translation.en: Look, all I'm saying is I know a hard-luck fella when I sees one.
translation.ko: 내가 하고 싶은 말은 이거야 난 팔자 꼬인 사람 잘 알아봐

translation.en: I used to be right where you are.
I used to worry about my wife and kids... They're grown now.
translation.ko: 처자식 걱정에 빠져 살았어 이제 애들은 다 컸고 딱한 아내는 죽었지만

translation.en: She's dead, God bless her.
translation.ko: 이제 애들은 다 컸고 딱한 아내는 죽었지만

translation.en: Good woman.
But I've been where you are, wondering what my life was gonna mean.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 나도 한때는 자네처럼 앞길이 캄캄했다는 뜻이야

translation.en: -What do you want? -I run a service station.
And business is booming!
I could use a good-looking fella like yourself pumping gas.
translation.ko: 자네처럼 잘생긴 남자가 일 좀 해줬으면 좋겠는데

translation.en: Why do you need someone good-looking to pump gas?
My gas station specializes in good-looking attendants.
translation.ko: 내 주유소의 특장점이 잘생긴 직원이기 때문이지

translation.en: It's my corner of the market, it's why we do good business. This is Hollywood, kid!
translation.ko: 그래서 장사가 잘되는 거야 여긴 할리우드잖아!

translation.en: It's what people want.
It's why they left their cow towns where they grew up.
translation.ko: 왜 정든 촌 동네를 떠나서 여기로 왔겠어?

translation.en: They don't want some fatso looking under their hood,
just reeking of sweat, grease under their fingernails.
translation.ko: 자기 차 만지면서 땀 뻘뻘 흘리는 꼴 보고 싶겠어?

translation.en: It's an intimate act, if you think about it,
translation.ko: 사실 자동차 정비라는 게 꽤 친밀한 행동이거든

translation.en: and, get this...
They'll tip big for it.
This is for you.
Thanks.
What I offer is a vision of a new America.
translation.ko: 난 지금 자네에게 미국의 앞날을 함께하자는 거야

translation.en: The America that you fought for.
translation.ko: 자네가 목숨 걸고 지킨 그 미국

translation.en: You're very kind, but no.
Okay.
Citrus and Normandy, if you change your mind.
translation.ko: 생각 바뀌면 시트러스가와 노먼디가 교차로로 와

translation.en: Golden Tip Gas.
It's not our anniversary, is it?
They cut our electricity, Jack.
Well...
sure is romantic, baby, huh?
Don't bother. You already knocked me up.
Cold wieners are on the table for you.
[Ernie] That looks good.
Kid, I gotta tell you, you look fantastic.
Handsome, young, brimming with optimism.
And, oh, by the way, you're clean, right? No venereal disease?
translation.ko: 참, 자네 깨끗한 거지? 성병 같은 거 없지?

translation.en: Okay, what is-- What do you mean? What are you talking about?
Look, kid, this town is all about dreams, right?
translation.ko: 이봐, 이 동네는 꿈 위에 지어진 도시야

translation.en: You know that.
And some of my customers don't just come here for gas.
translation.ko: 기름 말고 다른 걸 원하는 손님들도 있어

translation.en: They have, uh, fantasies and desires.
And for them, it ain't enough to watch a fantasy up on the big screen.
translation.ko: 영화로 보는 것만으론 충족이 안 되는 분들이거든

translation.en: They want it for themselves, and I provide that for them.
translation.ko: 직접 체험하고 싶어 하는데 내가 그 재미를 제공해

translation.en: In a way, I'm no different than Louis B. Mayer, you know what I mean?
translation.ko: 루이 B 메이어랑 다를 게 없어 뭔 느낌인지 알지?

translation.en: No, Ernie, I have no idea what you mean.
You see, some of them say a secret code word.
You get in the car with them. Have a drink maybe, or sometimes...
translation.ko: 같이 차 타고 나가서 술 한잔하고, 가끔은...

translation.en: sometimes you have to service 'em.
You gotta... you gotta be kidding me.
What? You don't like women?
Sure, I like women, that's why I married one.
[Ernie] All right, so let me ask you...
-You never cheated on her? -No.
Okay, I'm going to ask you again.
You never cheated on her?
[woman moaning] Oh, Jack.
No, uh... One time. One time, I was... I was on leave, I was drunk.
translation.ko: 딱 한 번 있었어요 휴가 중에 술에 취해서...

translation.en: Then you're good!
First time's always the hardest, and you got that outta the way.
translation.ko: 처음이 제일 힘든 법인데 넌 그걸 해결했네

translation.en: You're gonna be great.
Oh, here's one right here.
Jack, today is your lucky day.
translation.ko: 잭, 오늘 자네 운 좋은 날이야

translation.en: -[bell dings] -This one's special, take it from me.
No.
No, no, no. Ernie, I'm not doing this.
I came here to be in pictures, I'm gonna be a movie star.
translation.ko: 전 영화배우가 되려고 이 도시에 온 거예요

translation.en: This, this is not for me. I-- I appreciate...
translation.ko: 이건 제가 할 일이 아니에요 감사하지만...

translation.en: Look, you hired me to pump gas, I'll pump gas.
This, forget it. So long.
[Ernie] All right, but you just missed out on 100 bucks.
My customers pay twice that,
and you and me,
we split it, 50-50.
So, are you gonna take it?
Or am I giving it to one of the other guys?
Fuck me.
[Ernie] Attaboy!
You're gonna do great.
-Shut up. -[Ernie] Let me know how it goes.
Fill 'er up?
I wanna go to Dreamland.
Okay.
You'll do nicely.
♪ You know you've gotta get goin' If you're gonna make a showin'... ♪
Welcome.
Where are we going?
I got us a room. My daughter's at home.
translation.ko: 방 하나 잡아놨어 집엔 딸애가 있어서

translation.en: You aren't nervous about being recognized?
That's the fun of it.
So, how long have you been here?
Oh, you-- you mean in Los Angeles?
Just a couple of months. I'm from Missouri originally.
translation.ko: 두어 달쯤 됐어요 원래 고향은 미주리예요

translation.en: Let me guess...
you came here to be a movie star.
How did you know?
Takes one to know one.
I was in pictures. Silent films.
Good ones, too.
But then came the talkies.
I had one screen test,
and they told me there wasn't a place in talkies for ethnics.
translation.ko: 외국 혈통 배우들은 못 써먹겠다고 그러더군

translation.en: A little "Jewey" was the word they used.
I politely informed them that Jews built this town and was shown the door.
translation.ko: 난 유대인들이 이 도시를 지었다고 정중히 말해주고 나왔어

translation.en: Nobody thought a Jewish girl could be a movie star.
translation.ko: 유대인 여자는 영화배우가 될 수도 없고

translation.en: Nobody thought they were pretty.
So, I went to a bar and got drunk,
met a low-level executive who said he was about to get a promotion.
translation.ko: 곧 승진을 앞두고 있다는 한 말단 간부를 만났는데

translation.en: He said the only thing I could hope for was to be a development girl.
translation.ko: 난 아무리 발버둥 쳐도 잡일꾼밖에 못 될 거라고 했어

translation.en: A goddamn script reader.
I said, "Fuck this town, I'm done."
He knocked me up, we got married, and I've been punishing him ever since.
translation.ko: 그날 우린 사고 치고 결혼했고 그 뒤로 난 남편을 벌주는 중이야

translation.en: Oh, he did get that promotion, though.
Now he's the star, not this Jew.
translation.ko: 스타는 그이가 됐지 이 유대인 말고

translation.en: Can I ask you a question, Jack?
Why do you want to be a movie star?
You want an honest answer?
Well, we're about to get naked and fuck each other, so why not?
translation.ko: 곧 옷 벗고 몸 섞을 사이인데 나쁠 거 있나?

translation.en: Well, um, if I'm being honest...
all my life, folks thought I was dumb.
My mom and dad, my school teachers-- Oh, thank you.
All telling me I was lucky I was good-looking.
And I knew what they meant,
that that was all I had going for me.
I just want to do something big, you know?
Prove to them that I can be somebody in this world.
translation.ko: 나도 가치 있는 사람인 걸 증명할 수 있는

translation.en: Do something that matters.
[chuckling] So movies...
you think they matter?
You kidding?
I know they do.
When you're walking through your life,
it's easy to feel like you're going through the motions, right?
translation.ko: 마지못해 형식적으로 살고 있다는 느낌이 들잖아요

translation.en: Like it doesn't really mean anything.
But when I was a kid...
I grew up on a farm in Missouri,
so we had to drive a half hour to get to the picture show.
And when I looked up at that enormous screen,
I suddenly knew what life was supposed to feel like,
translation.ko: 산다는 게 무슨 기분인지 갑자기 느껴지더라고요

translation.en: what being alive was supposed to mean.
It was like there was something somewhere out there...
translation.ko: 마치 저 세상 어딘가에서 무언가가 나를

translation.en: waiting for me.
That's what being alive is supposed to mean.
translation.ko: 그게 바로 살아 있다는 뜻인 거예요

translation.en: I held my first hand at a movie theater,
I-- I had my first kiss at a movie theater, I...
I don't know.
What I do know is this:
every time I leave the picture show, I feel better than I did walking in.
translation.ko: 영화를 보고 나오면 항상 기분이 좋아져 있었어요

translation.en: I never thought about it like that.
Can I ask you a question?
Only if you come and sit by me.
I'm paying for company.
Why are you here?
I mean, doing this with me. [chuckles]
You got a husband you don't like?
Truth is, I don't entirely know how I'd get out of it.
translation.ko: 사실 남편이 없다고 해도 혼자 살 수 있을까 싶어

translation.en: I've gotten used to being rich, being taken care of.
translation.ko: 난 부유하게 살고 남에게 의지하는 데 익숙해졌어

translation.en: But I know that he can barely bring himself to touch me anymore.
translation.ko: 하지만 이제 내 남편은 날 만지는 것조차 무서워하지

translation.en: So what's a girl to do?
Bridge?
Parcheesi?
I tried sleeping with the help, but that's no good.
translation.ko: 집안 도우미랑 잘까 했는데 그건 안 되겠더라고

translation.en: This is much easier.
Less complicated.
You know, coming to a public place like this, it's, uh...
translation.ko: 이렇게 공개된 장소에서 이러는 걸 보면

translation.en: it's kinda like you're asking to be caught.
Maybe I am.
Maybe I want to make my husband jealous.
Maybe I want him to know...
that someone else desires me.
And that I'm still alive...
with so much more to give.
You're married.
Yeah, I am.
Do you feel guilty?
I gotta provide.
Then provide.
Yeah.
Listen...
How exactly do we, uh, get started?
Well, first you take your shoes off.
Oh, yeah. Got it.
My...
aren't I a lucky gal?
Listen, before we--
Can I ask you a question?
Just 'cause you've been through it.
You think I got what it takes?
I mean, to make it in this town?
Who can say?
But what I do know, Jack,
is you have a strong light inside you.
Shine that light on me.
Make me feel like I matter.
translation.ko: 날 가치 있는 사람으로 만들어 줘

translation.en: Even if it's a lie.
-Okay. -[chuckles]
Sammy, nice work. Ricky Boy, that's for you.
translation.ko: 새미, 수고했어 리키 보이, 돈 받고

translation.en: Bad Man Bruce, -Rough Ronny. -[Ronny] Thank you.
Hey, there, champ! I heard it went great!
And here's this for your trouble.
Not too bad, right?
Avis is a real pistol, ain't she? Ten-year regular of yours truly.
No, it was, uh...
She was kind.
It was actually all right.
Good. In that case, I got another one for you.
Just a quickie in the shed behind the station. Won't take you ten minutes.
translation.ko: 뒤쪽 창고에서 잠깐이면 돼 10분도 안 걸릴걸?

translation.en: -Right now? -Right now!
All yours, Kemosabe.
Well, hello there.
Ernie, there's been a mistake.
[stammers] There's some guy in there.
That's not just "some guy."
That's Cole Porter.
He's a living legend.
The Gay Divorcee, Anything Goes...
Yesterday I heard you humming "Don't Fence Me In."
translation.ko: 어제 자네가 흥얼거린 '돈트 펜스 미 인'까지

translation.en: That's the son of a bitch who wrote it!
So?
So give the guy two minutes of your time. He's real polite about it.
translation.ko: 그러니까 잠깐 시간 좀 내줘 예의를 아는 사람이야

translation.en: -Don't keep him waiting! -Are you...
Are you telling me you expect me to...
Forget it! Forget it, Ernie, I'm not doing that!
I'm not-- It's not me. It's not me!
I gotta draw the line somewhere, all right? I'm not doing it!
translation.ko: 저도 선이란 게 있다고요 그 짓은 못 해요!

translation.en: -End of story. -Okay.
I see how it goes.
You don't get to set the terms of your employment here, Jack, I do!
translation.ko: 고용 조건을 정하는 건 네가 아니라 나야!

translation.en: And I'm running low on guys this month and I got a bad cough I can't shake.
translation.ko: 이번 달은 직원도 부족한데 목감기가 떨어지질 않아서

translation.en: I'm not sitting at some shitty smokey bar to headhunt.
translation.ko: 사람 구한답시고 쾨쾨한 바에 죽치고 있을 수도 없어

translation.en: So if you can't walk into a shed and lend a helping hand
translation.ko: 그러니까 당장 돌아가서 국보급 인사인 콜 포터가

translation.en: to national treasure Cole Porter, you better find me somebody who can.
translation.ko: 해달라는 대로 해줘 안 그러면 다른 사람 찾아오든가

translation.en: Otherwise, no money,
and you can get the fuck out of here!
That suits me fine.
I quit.
Yeah, well, good luck then, kid!
I wanted to be a movie star too, you know!
Sweetheart.
What are you doing here?
Doctor's appointment?
Jeez, yeah. Um...
Tell Rudy I'm taking my break.
[man] You two own your own home?
[Henrietta] No, we're just renting at the moment.
translation.ko: "하이럼 올그런 박사 산부인과" - 아뇨, 세 들어 살고 있어요 - 자궁 경부엔 문제가 없네요

translation.en: Cervix feels just right.
translation.ko: - 아뇨, 세 들어 살고 있어요 - 자궁 경부엔 문제가 없네요

translation.en: Well, it's probably just as well,
because you know what they say,
having a kid is just as expensive as having a mortgage.
translation.ko: '애 키우는 게 집 대출금 갚는 것만큼 비싸다'

translation.en: All right, let's see if we can hear a heartbeat.
translation.ko: 자, 그럼 이제 심장 박동을 들어볼까요?

translation.en: Now, just relax.
Starting on the nursery yet?
No, we're in an efficiency so there really isn't room for a separate nursery.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 방 하나짜리 아파트라서 아기방을 놓을 수가 없어요

translation.en: So you're having a baby and looking for a new apartment?
translation.ko: 그럼 출산도 앞뒀는데 새집까지 구한다는 거예요?

translation.en: Sheesh, that's no fun.
Are you finding a heartbeat, or...
[doctor] They've also raised the price on formula, so keep that in mind.
Uh-oh.
What?
Twins.
-[Henrietta] What? -What?
-Yep. Two heartbeats. -You gotta be kidding me.
translation.ko: - 심장이 두 개네요 - 이건 말도 안 돼

translation.en: -[loud thud] -Jack!
-Hiya, Jack. -Flo.
[chuckles] How's Hollywood treating you? Oh, you know, I'm living the dream.
translation.ko: - 할리우드는 어때? - 꿈꾸던 삶을 살고 있죠

translation.en: -Mm-hm. -Listen, I got a favor to ask you.
I'm a little short on cash, but I could really use a costume.
translation.ko: 돈이 모자라긴 하는데 의상이 하나 필요해요

translation.en: What kind of costume?
-One, please. -[man] Um...
Uh, you don't have to pay, Officer. You can just go right in.
translation.ko: 안 내셔도 됩니다, 경관님 그냥 들어가세요

translation.en: Damn right, I don't have to pay.
How are you today?
I'm fine, how are you?
-I'm well. -Yeah?
You got any money, honey?
Sure do.
I bet you do.
Get out of here.
Shit!
You're coming with me.
Shit.
Walk.
-Are you going to put me in jail? -Shut up. Keep walking.
translation.ko: - 저 감옥 가는 거예요? - 닥치고 계속 걸어

translation.en: -Got a squad car somewhere, or-- -I said can it!
-We're going right around the corner. -Schwab's is around the corner.
translation.ko: - 저 앞 모퉁이에서 돌 거야 - 거긴 슈와브 약국이 있는데

translation.en: What, you don't like Schwab's?
What?
Could you just do me a favor and clue me in here?
translation.ko: 제발 부탁인데 상황 설명 좀 해줄래요?

translation.en: Am I getting arrested?
Listen, you're gonna get honest with me real fast
translation.ko: 잘 들어, 나한테 순순히 털어놓지 않으면

translation.en: or I'm taking you downtown to the lock-up.
Hey, Jack, it's ready.
Let's go.
Hey, Jack, what's with the get-up?
Nothing. It's just my uniform.
I wear it when I'm on duty.
I'll have a cup of coffee. My friend here will have a Shirley Temple.
translation.ko: 난 커피 마실게요 이 친구는 셜리 템플 주세요

translation.en: That's awfully rude, don't you think?
Explain yourself.
-What do you want me to say? -Start from the beginning, why don't you?
translation.ko: - 뭘 말하라는 거예요? - 처음부터 전부 다

translation.en: Okay.
I moved to LA after I got out of the service.
I wanted to be a writer.
Still do.
I wrote a script, you know?
Screenplay about Peg Entwistle,
a girl who jumped off the Hollywood sign because the town wouldn't accept her.
translation.ko: 도시가 자길 외면했다는 이유로 할리우드 사인에서 뛰어내린 여자

translation.en: I know the feeling, so I wrote about it.
translation.ko: 공감이 가는 이야기라서 그 각본을 썼고

translation.en: Sold my script, too.
But a hundred bucks...
ain't much,
and a studio ain't gonna put a black man under contract.
translation.ko: 게다가 흑인 남자랑 계약할 스튜디오도 없을 게 뻔하죠

translation.en: I got...
Can I smoke?
Yeah, go ahead.
Thank you.
You need money?
I get a dollar a script
down at the Lincoln Theater, writing vaudeville sketches.
translation.ko: 링컨 극장에서 보드빌 스케치 한 편을 쓰면요

translation.en: But that's once a week,
so the way I see it, gotta turn these tricks.
translation.ko: 몸 파는 일을 안 하면 먹고살 수 없다는 계산이 나오죠

translation.en: And I can't go cruise Pershing Square or the farmer's market, okay?
translation.ko: 그렇다고 퍼싱 스퀘어나 파머스 마켓에서 돌아다니다간

translation.en: Cops will arrest me just for loitering, so I turn my tricks up at Joe's place.
translation.ko: 아무 이유 없이 체포당할 테니까 조의 극장에서 그러고 있는 거예요

translation.en: Beats washing dishes,
and I like doing it.
Why not get paid for something that feels good that you was gonna do anyways?
translation.ko: 어차피 기분 좋게 할 일인데 돈 받고 하면 더 좋잖아요?

translation.en: I'm discerning.
-My tricks gotta be good-looking, clean-- -So, you're a gigolo.
translation.ko: - 내 손님은 잘생기고 깔끔하고... - 그럼 남창이네?

translation.en: I'm a writer.
Call it whatever you want.
I ain't ashamed.
I know who I am.
Now, Miss Shirley here is delicious.
What if I told you I could offer you an opportunity?
translation.ko: 내가 더 좋은 기회를 제안한다면 어떡할래?

translation.en: A job, doing what you're doing, but safer.
translation.ko: 지금 하는 일이랑 같은데 더 안전해

translation.en: What the hell kind of cop are you?
I know a fella who owns a gas station.
You pump gas, some customers you do a little more, you know what I'm saying.
translation.ko: 평소엔 기름 넣어주다가 가끔 서비스를 제공하면 돼

translation.en: Pay is good, very good.
More than what you're charging.
And if you wanted to, you could just do guys.
translation.ko: 그리고 원한다면 남자 고객만 받아도 돼

translation.en: You ain't no real cop.
Also, I do wanna ask you. I gotta ask you...
Pall Malls.
Could you make it with a woman if you had to?
Yeah.
Sure, I can fake it. Ain't that what most fellas do with their wives anyways?
translation.ko: 연기할 수 있지 남자들도 와이프랑 할 때 연기하잖아

translation.en: -He's paying for it. -Okay.
I'm gonna take you to meet my friend Ernie.
First, you're right, I'm not a cop.
translation.ko: 일단 네 말이 맞아 난 경찰 아냐

translation.en: I'm an actor.
But, until that moment just then,
you thought I was a cop, didn't you?
What I mean is, you would cast me as a cop...
right?
Sweet beans in a basket.
He'll do the guy stuff? Ask him.
If the price is right.
-50-50. -[scoffs] I'm worth more than that, 60-40.
I like this kid. Enterprising.
Okay, deal.
Ernie West.
-Archie Coleman. -You're gonna do a lot of business, kid.
translation.ko: - 아치 콜먼입니다 - 자네 많이 바빠질 거야

translation.en: I can tell just by looking at you.
What's the password again?
"Dreamland."
[Ernie] He's all yours, go get him.
I knew you'd be back.
They always come back.
How's it going?
Can I help you?
Uh, yeah, I want to go to Wonderland.
The street?
Oh, that's up there on Laurel Canyon.
[scoffs] You mean Dreamland?
Yeah. Dreamland.
Okay.
What can I do for you?
Uh, I don't know. Are there-- are there options here, or...
You're not interested in a black man?
No, I'm just a little nervous.
What's your name?
Roy. Roy Fitzgerald.
Archie.
This your place?
Yeah.
I'm renting month-to-month.
I know it ain't much, but it's all I can afford right now.
translation.ko: 대단한 집은 아니지만 내 형편엔 딱이야

translation.en: What do you want?
-What do you mean? -I mean what do you want to do...
to me?
Or what do you want me to do to you?
[scoffs] Oh, you're, uh...
I like how straightforward you are.
[chuckles] Yeah.
Well, I just wanna make sure you get your money's worth, Mr. Roy Fitzgerald.
translation.ko: 돈 받은 만큼 하고 싶어서 그러지 로이 피츠제럴드 선생님

translation.en: Can I ask you something?
Where are you from?
Illinois. Little town called Winnetka.
Fitzgerald's my stepdad, Scherer's my real dad's name.
translation.ko: 피츠제럴드는 새아빠 성이고 친아빠 성은 셰어야

translation.en: I came out here to reconnect with him, but...
it didn't really wash.
What about you? Where are you from?
Where am I from?
Memphis.
So, what's a good-looking guy like yourself doing paying for affection?
translation.ko: 왜 너처럼 잘생긴 남자가 돈으로 애정을 사고 있는 거지?

translation.en: Why not just go to those joints on Main Street?
Harold to the 1-2-3... Cookie, you're making me nervous. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 원하는 남자 고를 수도 있고 너 때문에 나도 긴장되네

translation.en: Relax.
I'll take good care of you.
Uh, I went down there once, but...
I-- I saw somebody I thought I recognized.
translation.ko: 왠지 아는 사람을 본 것 같았어

translation.en: A casting director.
So I pretended like I was in the wrong place and-- and walked out.
translation.ko: 잘못 들어간 척하고 바로 걸어 나왔어

translation.en: I'm gonna be an actor, see? So...
I-- I can't have anybody thinking I'm...
that way.
[Archie] I'm lucky I'm not trying to be in front of the camera.
translation.ko: 내가 카메라 앞에 안 서는 게 얼마나 다행인지 몰라

translation.en: That just wouldn't work for somebody like me.
translation.ko: 나 같은 사람은 절대 그렇게 못 살아

translation.en: -That's why I'm a writer. -A writer? You don't say.
Yeah. Well, I got a studio looking at one of my scripts.
translation.ko: 그래, 지금 한 스튜디오에서 내 각본을 살펴보고 있어

translation.en: It could be a first, you know? Major studio, black writer.
translation.ko: 내가 최초가 될 수도 있어 대형 스튜디오와 계약한 흑인 작가

translation.en: I mean, there's only been two or three black screenwriters before,
translation.ko: 물론 전에도 흑인 작가는 두세 명쯤 있었지

translation.en: Oscar Micheaux, Langston Hughes, but those were race pictures, you know?
translation.ko: 오스카 미쇼, 랭스턴 휴스 하지만 그들이 쓴 건 흑인 영화 각본이었어

translation.en: Stories about black folk.
It's like you can't even run those pictures in parts of this country.
translation.ko: 심지어 이런 지역에서는 상영도 안 해주는 영화들이야

translation.en: But, you see, my script’s about a white gal, so...
translation.ko: 하지만 난 백인 여자에 대한 이야기를 쓰고 있거든

translation.en: Who knows? Maybe you could star in it, Roy.
translation.ko: 혹시 알아? 네가 그 영화의 주연이 될지

translation.en: Could you imagine something like that?
-That would be-- -A dream.
Yeah.
Yeah.
In Dreamland.
And if it comes true?
When it comes...
true.
We'd look back and say the two of us meeting was
translation.ko: 우리가 만난 오늘을 떠올리며 그렇게 생각하겠지

translation.en: that Hollywood dream starting to come true.
There you go, Jack.
Buffalo Billy, Slippery Sammy, Rabid Ronny,
translation.ko: 버펄로 빌리, 능구렁이 새미 미친개 로니

translation.en: Goody Two-Shoes Glen, and Arch... Welcome to the family.
translation.ko: 샌님 글렌, 그리고 아치 가족이 된 걸 환영한다

translation.en: Ernie, what's the matter? You all right? [clears throat] It's nothing. It's nothing.
This black walnut blooms this time of year.
translation.ko: 매년 이맘때만 되면 꽃가루가 날려서 말이야

translation.en: Let's make it another great week, fellas! -[workers] Yes, sir! -Go get 'em. All right.
translation.ko: 이번 주도 잘해보자고 가서 일들 해

translation.en: -What'll it be? -Dreamland.
-Where to? -Dreamland.
-Where to for you? -Dreamland.
Hmm, you are really good at that, you know?
So is this what you do, full time?
No, uh, just to make ends meet.
I'm an actor.
Really?
I'm in casting.
[Jack] Excuse me, sorry.
Pardon me.
Jack! I ain't seen you in a while, Bubby! I thought you threw in the towel.
translation.ko: 잭, 이게 얼마 만이야? 아예 포기한 줄 알았잖아

translation.en: -No, still pounding the pavement. -Sure, sure. That's great.
translation.ko: - 아니, 여전히 발로 뛰는 중이지 - 그래, 잘됐어

translation.en: Me? I've been working every day this week on a Sidney Lanfield picture.
translation.ko: 난 이번 주 내내 시드니 랜필드 영화에 참여했어

translation.en: -Lot of frame wipes. Know what that is? -Sure.
I walk right next to the camera, real close,
translation.ko: 내가 카메라 앞에 붙어서 걷는 걸 찍은 다음

translation.en: and the director uses that to cut the scene together.
translation.ko: 감독이 그 영상으로 장면을 이어 붙여

translation.en: Practically editing this goddamn thing. Shh, shh, here she comes!
translation.ko: 그걸 다 편집하는 거라니까 저기 온다!

translation.en: Okay.
-I need three warm bodies. -[crowd clamoring]
You, you and... you.
That's it. See the rest of youse tomorrow.
Wanna grab a bite to eat? My treat.
[Jack] No, I think I'm gonna stick around. What are you talking about?
translation.ko: - 난 좀 더 있어 볼게 - 무슨 소리야?

translation.en: Jack?
Get in here.
What the hell's going on?
Oh, I, uh, I got a walk-on role in a Cecil B. DeMille picture.
translation.ko: 세실 B 데밀 영화에서 단역을 맡게 됐어

translation.en: Might get a line!
Hey, something's gonna happen for you one of these days, Lou, I know it!
translation.ko: 너한테도 곧 좋은 일 생길 거야 느낌이 와

translation.en: How are you?
[exhales] I love this town.
Hello, sweetheart.
What are you doing?
Nothing, just cooking dinner for my wife.
translation.ko: 내 아내를 위해 저녁을 준비하고 있지

translation.en: Hungry?
No, suspicious.
What did you do?
Uh, nothing, nothing. Just come here. Sit down.
translation.ko: 그런 거 아니야 어서 와서 앉아봐

translation.en: We're celebrating.
Celebrating what?
You quitting your job.
-What? I like working at Schwab's! -I can't have you on your feet all day.
translation.ko: - 난 슈와브에서 일하는 거 좋아 - 온종일 서 있을 순 없잖아

translation.en: You're three months along, I don't want you working anymore, all right?
translation.ko: 임신 3개월 차잖아 이제 그만 일했으면 좋겠어

translation.en: Not another word about it.
Let's eat.
Just eat!
Oh...
my...
-God. -That's $500.
How-- How did you get this?
I've been doing good work at the gas station.
Rent's already paid, gas and electric too.
Now, that ain't for spending, all right?
translation.ko: 그 돈은 쓰면 안 돼, 알았지?

translation.en: That's a down-payment... on a house.
Oh, my God. I-- I don't...
I thought that's what you wanted.
[laughing] It is, I just can't believe it!
Oh, my God!
Thank you! Thank you.
Anything for you. Anything for my family.
translation.ko: 뭐든 할 수 있어 내 가족을 위해서라면

translation.en: What does that mean, "sexually ambidextrous"?
That means that my man Stan here likes the cat and the kitty.
translation.ko: 저기 있는 우리 친구 스탠이 상대를 가리지 않는다는 거지

translation.en: Huh, no fooling?
Well, welcome aboard, Stan.
-[bell dings] -Thanks.
All yours, Jack.
-Fill 'er up? -Dreamland.
-Hello. -How are you?
-Better now, thank you. -Glad to hear it.
Oh, no, uh, I don't touch the money. You pay Ernie and Ernie pays me.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 저는 돈 안 받아요 어니한테 주시면 됩니다

translation.en: Well, what about a tip?
Well, you can give it to me after, if you're satisfied.
Well, wouldn't this ensure that I'm satisfied?
Okay, thanks.
-You're under arrest. -What?
Got him!
Wait a minute, what is it? Whoa, buddy, buddy, what is this?
translation.ko: 잠깐, 이게 뭐예요? 뭐 하시는 거예요?

translation.en: -Wait a minute, wait! -[officer] Shut up!
You're under arrest for solicitation and lewd conduct
pursuant to California Penal Code, section 647-B.
translation.ko: 성매매 권유 및 음란죄 혐의로 당신을 체포합니다
